TextView.android:text: GEAR UP AND HOLD YOUR NERVES TIGHT, THE SECOND SEASON OF “F1……UNLEASH THE BEAST” IS ON ITS WAY

Make a wireless radio controlled machine, powered by an IC engine, which can race against other opponents on an off-road dirt track with many obstacles.
 Track specification:

1.Track is of 1.2mtrs, which contain even and uneven rough surfaces, with small size and large size hurdles and also sharp turns.
 2.Track length is nearly about 130mtrs.
